item.title: Code not working?
item.dc:creator: @JRealm JRealm
item.description:
@JRealm wrote:

class randomDemo {

randomDemo() { System.out.println("By JRealm. Written for goodboi1112."); }

private static int random(int i1) {
return (int)(java.lang.Math.random() * (i1+1));
}

private void method1(int rd) {
if(random(rd)) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
System.out.println("Error fixed. Now Only needs to Modify the class file abit to make it Succesfull.");
System.out.println("Well Done.");
}
}

}

Just a demo for j00
